name: Todo List
description: Track tasks with checkboxes, priorities, and due dates. Perfect for daily todos, project tasks, or any actionable list.
author: Frame Team

fields.name: title
fields.label: List Title
fields.placeholder: What is this todo list for?

fields.name: summary
fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: Context or goals for this list

template:
---
title: "{title}"
summary: "{summary}"
tags: [{tags}]
contentType: todo
priority: {priority}
dueDate: {dueDate}
progress: 0
created: {date}
---

# {title}

{summary}
